statements: SELECT * FROM print_media_issues;
SELECT issue_id, publication_name, publication_date FROM print_media_issues WHERE type='newspaper';
SELECT publication_name, editor_name, language FROM print_media_issues WHERE publication_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM print_media_issues WHERE language='English' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT issue_id, publication_name, editor_name FROM print_media_issues WHERE is_archived=True;
SELECT * FROM print_media_issues WHERE type='newspaper' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT issue_id, publication_name FROM print_media_issues WHERE language='English' AND is_archived=FALSE ORDER BY publication_date LIMIT 5
SELECT editor_name FROM print_media_issues WHERE type='magazine' AND language='French' AND publication_date>'2022-01-01'
SELECT publication_name, publication_date, language FROM print_media_issues WHERE is_archived=TRUE ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM print_media_issues WHERE editor_name='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM newspapers;
SELECT name, publisher FROM magazines;
SELECT id, name, publication_date FROM newspapers WHERE publisher='New York Times';
SELECT name FROM magazines ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM newspapers WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, publisher FROM newspapers;
SELECT id, name, publication_date FROM newspapers WHERE publisher = 'New York Times';
SELECT * FROM newspapers WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT publisher, COUNT(id) AS number_of_newspapers FROM newspapers GROUP BY publisher;
SELECT name AS publication_name, COUNT(id) AS newspaper_count FROM newspapers GROUP BY name HAVING newspaper_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM newspaper_issues;
SELECT issue_date, newspaper_name FROM newspaper_issues WHERE issue_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM article_archive WHERE publication_type = 'news';
SELECT magazine_name FROM magazine_issues WHERE issue_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM magazine_issues ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM newspaper_issues LIMIT 10;
SELECT issue_date, newspaper_name FROM newspaper_issues WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT magazine_name, COUNT(*) FROM magazine_issues GROUP BY magazine_name;
SELECT * FROM article_archive WHERE publication_type = 'newspaper' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM article_archive WHERE publication_type = 'magazine';
SELECT * FROM Newspapers;
SELECT newspaper_name, publication_date FROM Newspapers WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT magazine_name FROM Magazines WHERE magazine_id = 2;
SELECT issue_id, issue_date FROM NewspaperIssues ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MagazineIssues WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Newspapers ORDER BY publication_date DESC, newspaper_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT newspaper_name, publication_date FROM Newspapers WHERE publication_date<'2022-01-01' ORDER BY newspaper_name;
SELECT magazine_name FROM Magazines WHERE publication_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT newspaper_name, issue_date FROM Newspapers JOIN NewspaperIssues ON Newspapers.newspaper_id = NewspaperIssues.newspaper_id;
SELECT * FROM MagazineIssues WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM newspapers ORDER BY issue_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, publisher FROM newspapers WHERE publisher='New York Times';
SELECT * FROM newspaper_articles JOIN newspapers ON newspaper_articles.newspaper_id = newspapers.id WHERE newspapers.title='The Guardian';
SELECT title, content FROM magazine_articles WHERE magazine_id=3;
SELECT author_name FROM publication_authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM newspapers WHERE publisher='New York Times';
SELECT title, issue_date FROM magazines WHERE editor='Jane Doe' AND issue_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM newspaper_articles ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, content FROM magazine_articles WHERE magazine_id=2;
SELECT title, author_name FROM newspaper_articles JOIN publication_authors ON newspaper_articles.id=publication_authors.id;
